message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'd be very interested in. I'm asking for $90 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low.  How about we split the difference and meet at $85?  I'm confident you'll find this a fair price.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $78?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but how about $82? This is a good deal for both of us and would allow us to close this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $79?
